ЁЯФД
Restorer

Tailapa II (Tailapa Ahvamalla) defeated the Rashtrakuta king Karka II and founded the Western Chalukya dynasty of Kalyani. He revived the Chalukya glory after an interval of 200 years.

тЪФя╕П
Conflict with Paramara Munja

He had a long conflict with Raja Munja of Malwa, the Paramara king. It is said that Munja defeated him six times, but in the seventh battle, Tailapa captured Munja and eventually executed him.
